lead_paragraph: Maybe it’s another sign of those green shoots that suggest the terrible economy is improving. Or perhaps it’s a corporate policy to be as cheerful as Mickey Mouse. Whatever the reason, ad chiefs of two networks owned by the Walt Disney Company — ABC and ESPN — expressed hopeful outlooks at separate upfront presentations on Tuesday morning.

headline.main: Upfronts: Disney Networks Offer a Theme Song, ‘When You Wish Upon an Ad’
